title: My name was changed
body: I borrow acc to my friend, on acc i have 3k IP. When he logon to my acc i was quit, then i login back to my acc and i saw other name. I dont know how he chaned my summoner name if i have only 3k ip and 10rp on acc. Maybe with mistery box or hextech chest?

replies.body: We don't support account sharing, and doing so runs the risk of cases like this where unwanted changes are made.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will see what can be done.  In the meantime, I highly recommend changing your password and refrain from sharing your info in the future.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
Now i saw in purchase history that he buy summoner name change 13900 ip, how is that possible when i had just 3k IP.
